程序包 prezoom.model.GObject

类 GObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • prezoom.model.GObject.GObject
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    GImage, GLine, GOval, GRectangle, GText
    public abstract class GObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The base class for all graphical objects
    作者:
    Zhijie Lan

    create date: 2020/11/1

    另请参阅:

      the actual shape object that shows on the canvas

    • 字段详细资料

      • gAttributeManager

        private final GAttributeManager gAttributeManager
        the manager to manage the state of this object

      • drawShape

        protected java.awt.Shape drawShape
        the actual shape object that shows on the canvas

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GObject

        protected GObject​(java.lang.Double x,
                  java.lang.Double y,
                  java.awt.Color col,
                  java.lang.Boolean filled,
                  java.lang.Integer lineWidth,
                  java.lang.Double width,
                  java.lang.Double height,
                  java.lang.Double x2,
                  java.lang.Double y2,
                  java.lang.Boolean visible,
                  java.lang.String fontName,
                  java.lang.Integer fontStyle,
                  java.lang.Double fontSize,
                  java.lang.String textString)
        the constructor will call the GAttributeManager to manage all the attributes
        参数:
        x - location, x
        y - location, y
        col - paint color
        filled - whether filled
        lineWidth - width of lines
        width - width of the object, if applicable
        height - height of the object, if applicable
        x2 - x2 of the object, if applicable
        y2 - y2 of the object, if applicable
        visible - whether visible
        fontName - font name
        fontSize - font size
        fontStyle - plain, bold, or italic
        textString - the text content

    • 方法详细资料

      • draw

        public abstract void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        generate the shape to draw
        参数:
        g - the Graphics to paint

      • drawing

        protected void drawing​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        General function to draw all kinds of shapes use GAttributes.getColor() as color. use GAttributes.getFilled() to depend whether calling Graphics2D.fill(Shape) or Graphics2D.draw(Shape). use GAttributes.getWidth() to set the line style
        参数:
        g - the Graphics to paint

      • inShape

        public boolean inShape​(double mx,
                       double my)
        Whether the given position is in this object
        参数:
        mx - x
        my - y
        返回:
        True if in the object

      • getAttributeManager

        public GAttributeManager getAttributeManager()
        Get the attribute manager of this object
        返回:
        the attribute manager

      • getCurrentAttributes

        public GAttributesI getCurrentAttributes()
        Get the attributes for the current state
        返回:
        current attributes

      • getResizePoints

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D[] getResizePoints()
        get the position of the diagonal points to draw the resize points
        返回:
        diagonal points
